description:
Curtis kind of has this Bad Ass feel about him. Very calm and collected, confident, but I kind of get the feeling he might go from kicking your ass to fucking it.
Not to say he is violent, but if you have bad boy fantasies, I think Curtis can fill them.
He's a smart guy too, so don't let the tough attitude fool ya.
He seems to be down for getting his dick sucked and I am pretty sure he would top a dude. He's got that aggressiveness in him.
I think he will be back to do more, so stay tuned. I can't decide to let him do a Serviced video or put him in a more vulnerable Edge chair position!
title: Curtis - Solo
